text: Mattia Giardi (born 15 December 1991) is a Sammarinese footballer who plays as a defender for Folgore and the San Marino national team. ==International career== Giardi made his international debut for San Marino on 8 September 2018, starting in the 2018–19 UEFA Nations League D match against Belarus, which finished as a 0–5 away loss. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|San Marino |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2018||5||0 |- |2019||5||0 |- |2020||1||0 |- !Total!!11!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Mattia Giardi at eu- football.info Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Sammarinese footballers Category:San Marino international footballers Category:San Marino under-21 international footballers Category:San Marino youth international footballers Category:Association football defenders
title: Mattia Giardi
